_comment: Copy this file to .mcp.json and fill in your values. Choose ONE of the configs below.
_local_usage: Run MCP server locally via stdio (same machine as Claude Code)
_remote_usage: Connect to a talk-mcp server running on another machine via Streamable HTTP
_remote_server_start: On the remote machine, start the server with: MCP_TRANSPORT=http ELEVENLABS_API_KEY=your_key AUDIO_PLAYER=pw-play uv run python server.py
